title: Funn Mamba S combines clipless and flat pedal platform, now lighter & lower profile!
content:
A new iteration of Funn Mamba S pedals combines the mountain bike control of clipless with the all-mountain freedom of platform pedals, now lighter than ever. Scaled-down to a smaller, lower-profile flat pedal to better suit more modern enduro racing, technical trail riding & even gravel, the Mamba S still delivers the flexibility to pick […]

The post Funn Mamba S combines clipless and flat pedal platform, now lighter & lower profile! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
